name: Recipe: Coffee Bavarois
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Coffee Bavarois.

customize.name: Coffee Beans
customize.desc: A common fruit in Teyvat with a special aroma. It can be used to make beverages after being ground.

customize.name: Milk
customize.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Cream
customize.desc: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.

customize.name: Coffee Bavarois
customize.desc: A refreshing dessert. Though it is one of Fontaine's trademark desserts, its recipe is very simple and straightforward. As long as the proportion of ingredients is right, hardly anyone could fail at making this dessert. It has an exquisite texture with a touch of refreshing cold taste, and can instantly lift your spirits.

value.text: Purchase from Wolsey at Coupon Cafeteria in Fortress of Meropide
